Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet (hippopotamus)
Description: Amulet representing a very schematised hippopotamus, in profile. The details of the head are depicted on the upper edge. There are diagonal striations on the dorsal edge.  The legs are represented by the hollowing out of a cavity in the middle of the lower section. The object is not pierced.
